Package com.rb.nonbiz.testmatchers

Class RBMatchers

java.lang.Object
com.rb.nonbiz.testmatchers.RBMatchers
public class RBMatchers
extends java.lang.Object
Test infrastructure for comparing objects using TypeSafeMatchers.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static interface  RBMatchers.MatcherGenerator<T>  
    static class  RBMatchers.RBTypeSafeMatcher<T>
    This is to allow the possibility of avoiding the annoying describeTo implementation which clutters up the test code.
